abstract: Among the April Fools’ jokes was news on the iPad, Facebook games and Amazon book sales.
snippet: Among the April Fools’ jokes was news on the iPad, Facebook games and Amazon book sales.
lead_paragraph: Thursday’s installment is a mixture of the fake and the real, but the tech editors and reporters of The New York Times sorted it out.

headline.main: What We’re Reading: The April Fools’ Edition
